description_top: Kitāb al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb (The Canon of Medicine)
catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Kitāb al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb (The Canon of Medicine)
author: Ibn Sīnā (d. 1037)
description: The annotations in this early manuscript make it an important copy reflecting thirteenth-century CE interpretations of the text.
